session_summary: John and James spoke at 3:47 pm on 17th March 2022. John asked James about his motivation, which James attributed to his love for video games. They discussed their favorite games, programming skills, and a potential collaboration on a dog care app. James shared his project of creating a computer game based on childhood sketches. John admired James' passion and expressed interest in trying VR gaming together. They agreed to meet for VR gaming the following Saturday.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Hey! Glad to finally talk to you. I want to ask you, what motivates you?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Hey John! Video games give me tons of joy and excitement, so they keep me motivated!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Cool, James! I'm a big video game fan too. They help me relax after a long day. What game are you currently enjoying the most?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I'm totally into The Witcher 3 right now. The story and atmosphere are amazing. Have you tried it yet?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Haven't played it yet, but I hear it's awesome. Gonna give it a go. BTW, just signed up for a programming class. Have you ever done any programming?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Programming is an awesome skill. I tried it out one in college and now it`s all my life. Good luck in the class! Do you have any coding experience?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: I did a bit of coding in HTML and CSS a few years back. Thought I'd refresh those skills in this course. What languages do you like most and any projects you've done?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a computer screen showing a video game scene
conversation_turns.text: I've worked with Python and C++. I've built a website and also created some game mods. Here is one example.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: That mod looks amazing! The graphics are awesome. What other programming languages have you worked with?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I haven’t worked with any other programming languages, but I hope to work in the future.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Maybe in the future we will develop mobile applications together? Do you like the idea?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two dogs are tied to a fence with a leash
conversation_turns.text: It would be cool! For example, we could write some kind of application for dogs. By the way, my dogs.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Aww, they're adorable! What are the names of your pets? And what are your plans for the app?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Max and Daisy. Will be actually cool to build an app for dog walking and pet care. The goal is to connect pet owners with reliable dog walkers and provide helpful information on pet care.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Sounds good, James! Bet that app would find a lot of buyers. What sets it apart from other existing apps?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a notepad with a handwritten note on it
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, John! The personal touch really sets it apart. Users can add their pup's preferences/needs - just like they were customizing it for them. Making it unique for each owner and pup.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: That's a great idea! Your pup is gonna love it. Speaking of personal touches, what motivates you to work on your programming projects?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a notebook with a list of things on it
conversation_turns.text: Creating something and seeing it come to life gives me a great sense of accomplishment. It's an amazing feeling. I write down all my goals in a notebook. It's very satisfying to check off each one when it's done.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: What are you working on that has you feeling so accomplished?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a drawing of a girl in a plane
conversation_turns.text: I'm working on something I've wanted to do since I was a kid. Even as a child, I made some sketches of the main character. Back then I was just drawing comics, but now I want to turn it into a computer game. It's a project that has me really excited.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Wow, James! That's amazing. What made you decide to work on it and create your own game?

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I'm always excited to combine my favorite passions: gaming and storytelling. It's great creating my own project and bringing my ideas to life, plus the challenge is really enjoyable!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a medical chart with instructions for the procedure
conversation_turns.text: That sounds really fulfilling! Combining your passions to make something new must be so exciting. Can't wait to see the outcome.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Thanks John! It's super exciting. I'll keep you updated on the progress. Perhaps, thanks to your knowledge of HTML, I'll invite you to help with some things in my game.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: It will be great to work with you, James.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I'll be looking forward to it. By the way, yesterday I went bowling and got 2 strikes. I love bowling!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: I'm sure you're very good at this. Unfortunately, I can’t share my love for him with you, my fingers are too big. Perhaps I should take up exercise, at least start going for a run in the morning. And I also don’t like bowling itself, to be honest.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: It's a pity, it would be nice to go play with you one day.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Well, I'm sure we can do something else. We can play slot machines and arcades, for example.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: The last time I played at the slot machines, I was so engrossed in the game that I didn't notice my wallet being taken out of my pocket. Sad story.

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: I'm sorry to hear it. Well, I'll be nearby, I'll look after your pockets.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Still, maybe we can try something different?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Heard about VR gaming? It's pretty immersive. We can try it together!

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: I tried it - it's crazy how real it feels! Have you given it a shot?

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Tried it a few times, it's insane how immersive that experience can be. Can't wait to try it together with you.

conversation_turns.speaker: James
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, VR gaming is awesome! Let`s do it next Saturday!

conversation_turns.speaker: John
conversation_turns.text: Agreed, James!

James: creating a game and telling a story through it.
James proposes making dog-sitting mobile apps with John. The app's custom filters will set it apart from other dog-sitting apps on the market.
John: John decides to take up a course in programming HTML, CSS
John proposes collaborating with James to make mobile apps.
John signed up for a programming class to refresh his skills in HTML and CSS.
John suggested the idea of developing mobile applications together in the future.
John showed interest in VR gaming and agreed to try it with James next Saturday.
James: James tried programming in college and now it's a big part of his life.
James has worked with Python and C++, building websites and creating game mods.
James plans to build an app for dog walking and pet care, aiming to connect pet owners with reliable dog walkers.
James is working on a project to turn his childhood sketches of a main character into a computer game, combining his passions for gaming and storytelling.
